headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Hubbell’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Hubbell’s first quarter results fell short of Wall Street’s expectations, prompting a negative market reaction. Management attributed the performance to persistent cost inflation from raw materials and tariffs, as well as anticipated softness in grid automation. CEO Gerben Bakker noted that while Electrical Solutions delivered mid-single-digit organic growth, grid infrastructure only returned to organic growth after a period of customer inventory normalization.
